text: The Durrani are one of the largest tribes of Pashtuns. Their traditional homeland is the Lōy Kandahār region of Southern Afghanistan and Balochistan as well as a presence in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa in the north-western part of Pakistan. Ahmad Shah Durrani is the founding father of the nation of Afghanistan who belonged to this tribe. File:Coronation of Ahmad Shah Durrani in 1747 by Breshna.jpg|The Coronation of Ahmad Shāh as ruler of Afghanistan ==Related pages== * Yusufzai * Ghilzai Category:Ethnic groups in Afghanistan Category:Ethnic groups in Pakistan Category:Ethnic groups in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Tribes of Afghanistan Category:Tribes of Pakistan
title: Durrani
